name: re:gicide
description:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/regicide

This is an immersive stealth game, audio HIGHLY recommended!

Take the role of an unfortunate peasant stuck in the middle of a brutal civil war. Your village has been raided and put to the torch, but just as you die you have a vision, a mysterious rider on a glowing green hooved horse appears. He stabs you with his magic sword and you awake back before your unfortunate end. What could this mean? What does the mysterious rider want? Might it have something to do with this unjust war and the tyrant now occupying the keep?

Controls: Move with WASD, CTRL to stealth, Click to interact with blue glowing objects and climb ladders

Avoid evil knights (red eyes) and hungry dogs. Don’t get shot by arrows. Use your looping lives to open up obstacles and shortcuts.

FIND THE KING BRING JUSTICE TO THIS WORLD
